### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    currency VARCHAR(3),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(10)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payments SET amount = 100.50 WHERE payment_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    account_balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 100.00 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    account_balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - (SELECT amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = user_accounts.user_id AND status = 'completed') WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'completed');

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    account_balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payment_transactions SET status = 'refunded' WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0) AND status = 'completed';
